Atreides.name: Duncan
Atreides.desc: One of Leto's most trusted men and House Atreides' Swordmaster, Duncan was tasked with being Leto's ambassador to the Fremen upon their arrival on Arrakis.
attributes: For each allied unit bonus, gains Heroism

Atreides.name: Gurney
Atreides.desc: Warmaster and poet, Gurney's indefectible loyalty and long service to House Atreides earned him the status of valued friend and confidant.

Harkonnen.name: Rabban
Harkonnen.desc: Nicknamed "the Beast" after murdering his own father, the Count of Lankiveil is every bit as evil and corrupt as his uncle, the Baron Harkonnen.
attributes: Uncontrollable owned units at long range become allies

Harkonnen.name: Iakin
Harkonnen.desc: Iakin is the Captain of the House Harkonnen guard. Although regarded as decently reliable while on duty, he is a known Semuta addict.
attributes: When Iakin has no Life, steals the Life of an ally ground unit at short range instead of dying

Fremen.name: Chani
Fremen.desc: Chani is a young Fremen mothered by the famous imperial planetologist Liet Kynes. A bold and charismatic woman and an adept fighter.

Fremen.name: Otheym
Fremen.desc: Otheym is a renowned and fearsome Fremen fighter who left Sietch Gara Kulon for Sietch Tabr led by Stilgar.

Smugglers.name: Drisq
Smugglers.desc: Drisq is Esmar Tuek's loyal quartermaster, managing supplies and commodities for the whole Sietch.
attributes: Detects Sneak units in a very long range
Units in the same region get Sneak during Smuggler operations

Smugglers.name: Bannerjee
Smugglers.desc: Bannerjee serves as the head of security at Tuek's Sietch. A stout, intimidating hulk of a man with a jaded outlook on life.
attributes: After a successful siege with Bannerjee, all units regain all their Supply

Corrino.name: Wensicia
Corrino.desc: Wensicia is the third daughter of Shaddam IV. She is trained in stewardship and takes care of much of the day to day logistics of the imperial palace.

Corrino.name: Aramsham
Corrino.desc: Captain Aramsham is a proud Sardaukar officer, used to wielding authority over his subordinates.
attributes: Gains buff until end of combat every time a Sardaukar at long range executes an enemy unit

Ecaz.name: Whitmore
Ecaz.desc: Whitmore Bludd was a renowned instructor at the Ginaz swordmaster school. After the fall of Ginaz, he entered the service of House Ecaz.
attributes: Can name a second Ecaz Champion of a different type

Ecaz.name: Ilesa
Ecaz.desc: Ilesa is the second daughter of Armanda. Having barely survived an assassination attempt at the onset of adulthood.

Vernius.name: Nuwa
Vernius.desc: Nuwa is the brillant automation engineer behind a lot of recent breakthroughs in self-learning drone technology.

Vernius.name: C'Tair
Vernius.desc: C'Tair is the son of Cammar Pilru. During the suboid revolt, he remained on Ix where he single-handedly led a resistance movement.
attributes: Ally non-mechanical units at short range gain Sneak
